items.summary: High latency in SEPA Instant Credit Transfers - Frankfurt Node
items.description: Customer transactions are hanging at 'PENDING' state. Correlation ID: TX-EU-7782. Logs indicate gateway timeout at the EU-Central-1 ingress point. Potentially related to API Spec v4.2 update.

items.summary: PSD2 SCA handshaking failure for French Merchant IDs
items.description: Auth calls returning ERR-EU-AUTH-403. This is impacting 15% of transactions in the FR region. Check SOP-SEC-09 for compliance keys.

items.summary: Batch processing delay: EU Clearing House Sync
items.description: Nightly reconciliation for EOD Jan 29 failed. Status code 502 Bad Gateway during POST to /v1/reconcile.

items.summary: Update CephStore quota for Payment Audit Logs
items.description: Audit logs for EU payments are reaching the 500GB threshold. Link to JCENG-3818. Need to sync quota before overflow occurs.
EUR to GBP conversions taking > 1200ms. Service health check shows memory leak in pod xc-curr-eu-02.
